website_summaries.verdict: Though other similar options offer higher quality material, this model still garners praise for its price and performance.
pros: Sports soft, silky material that's easy to clean
Blocks out light fairly well, and comes at a reasonable price
cons: Size and color options are limited
Some owners wish the material was a bit thicker or came with a liner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my college student's apartment to create another bedroom out of a living room
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this partition curtain. Used the InterDesign Cameo Constant Tension Shower curtain rod to hang this in a double wide doorway between a dining and living room in my college son's apartment, so he can use the living room as a bedroom. The grommets easily slid over the rod. Perfect length for the doorway. Opens and closes easily. Dark color provides good privacy.
customer_reviews.author: JA KlingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Hello darkness, my old friend
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing at blocking out the light. I set them up as close to the window as possible and the only light that comes in is what comes through the, admittedly pretty big hoops. This is minimal and certainly not enough that you will get woken up in the wee hours of the morning. I have yet to test it's insulating properties as advertised, I will update this review once the full brunt of summer comes in. But, for the time being, I am certainly considering getting some of these for every window in my place.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as eclipse blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy these curtains for all around my house. Good heavy weight to them, Yet very nice soft touch feeling. Blocks out a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Takes Two for True Blackout
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark grey ones. With no blinds or other covering on an East-facing window, the sunlight filters through a good bit and is disturbing for anyone trying to sleep in the room when it's not absolutely dark outside. I ended up buying two and using a double curtain rod so there are two layers of these curtains. With the double layer and adding a window scarf over the top and sides of the curtains, the room was blacked out. On a covered window, they work fine in a single layer.
customer_reviews.author: Jorja229

customer_reviews.title: It works....
customer_reviews.text: I got this curtaon to divide my room in half to create a sort of nursery on the other side. The curtain is heavy duty and does a great job dividing the room. I like the dark gray color and it definitely blocks out the light from the windows. Not sure on the noise blocking, but I will find out when the baby gets here. As fast as quality, the curtain is made from nice, strong fabric. I would buy this product again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Elle_C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect touch!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a ranch style single family and the extra room off family room is where we have the kids play area - well I needed something to hide the toys and this was PERFECT!!!!! The entire playroom wall is windows so this also works to block out sun, cool and hot air! We have surround sound in family room, so this helps to darken room and make for the best ambiance to watch movies!!! No complaints at all. It does hang down long so we have it draped on floor - but that adds to the touch and style I was looking for. I would definitely recommend this room divider curtain. Thick and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly For Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this curtain to close off the guest area. I have looked for other materials like accordion doors, etc, none of them come at the size of the opening and had to be custom made for about $500 minimum. After looking around for a solution, I came across this curtain that happens to have the size that match the size of the opening and at sub $100 price tag. The quality is great. A bit taller than what I need for about 1-2 inches but that's alright. Blocks light completely (except at the ring and top opening) but it's good for privacy. And when not in use, I can tuck it out of sight behind the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Hadi S.

customer_reviews.title: Why 3 stars instead of 5?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the material quality, durability and value for money are all great. It serves the purpose of providing privacy without seeing through it... but its appearance and the way the heavy fabric hangs is very similar to what you might find in a hospital room. It wasn't exactly the look I was going for, but works in a pinch for now until I can find something more fashionable. The gray color is fairly light, but still obviously gray, but "meh." If it's utility you need, this should fit the bill. Don't plan on decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Cmartcookie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used these curtains to divide a room and they work wonderfully. No light passes through these curtains so it offers the perfect amount of privacy for what I was looking for. The build quality seems really sturdy in terms of the fabric. I bought four of these and in one of the packages there was an issue with one of the rings but I was able to bend it back and it was fine for me. No one is going to be inspecting each ring though that may have bothered someone else. Otherwise everything about this product is perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Aldrichdesigner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect room divider
customer_reviews.text: I share a room. I needed something to separate our personal space with something other than a desk. I also needed something to give the room a warmer feel. This red room divider does exactly that. I love the thickness of the fabric. It's robust yet light. I love the generous rod holes at the top. While the seems are on one side they are barely noticeable and there is no difference in texture on either side of the curtain. A superior product that will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Saber42G

customer_reviews.title: It's curtains for me
customer_reviews.text: Thick enough to keep out light and dampen sounds. Light enough to move easily. I have a 12'10" space to hang 2 of them across. I got this rod to go with it -  . I am giving the rod a 3. Even without the curtains it hangs down a bit. In the morning the curtains are about 3' from the walls since they like to slide. I am magnetizing the ends to get the steel rivets to stick!
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Washington

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick and packaged nicely. As mentioned in other reviews, the curtain is long. I prefer that in curtains. You can always hem them if needed, but it suits the area I have it hung. I had an 8' x 7' opening to fill, so I bought the 96" x 120" to take in account the pleating effect when hung. I still need to steam the curtain, but the kids are loving the divider for their game room from the rest of the house. This curtain is lightweight which is great for the ceiling track I have it hung from, and it does a great job of blocking out all light.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: It's great, so I'm not sharing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a divider curtain, actually I put up a tension rod and hung this great looking curtain on it, and boom, all my storage area, is hidden, well, mostly, I ordered the wrong size. But it works, it looks great...and you are going to have to buy your own...this one is mine
customer_reviews.author: James C Estep III

customer_reviews.title: Very wide and block the sun
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 2 of these for my parents over the last couple of years and they rave about them. It’s hard to find panels this wide and I took a risk the first time wondering if the quality would be ok. They really block out the light and are great for very wide windows.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: Yay!! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These work for what I was wanting. I have an office space that need something to close off from the rest of the house. Doors where not an option at this time. I need some private space to study and work.
customer_reviews.author: amber brown

customer_reviews.title: good quality and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to close off a room (until we can build a real wall) and this curtain looks great. It's thick, quality fabric, and the grommets are a good size and installed well. Very happy with this purchase. The gray is a bit lighter than it looked like when we ordered, but that doesn't change how happy I am with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice length and width.
customer_reviews.text: A little bit disappointed in the heaviness of the fabric, lighter than I wanted and doesn’t block very much light out. I ordered the light grey / stone color so maybe if I would have went with a darker color it would block better, I don’t know. I needed the length more than anything, as we have high ceilings and our windows are larger than normal. The width is a plus, I didn’t need them as wide as they are so I think that might help block more light out because more material to scrunch up.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for.. used it to separate a living area with window AC unit. Kept the cool air in and hot air out. Quality product at a good price. Color is beautiful, as pictured, I believe it was called "sea teal". Thick enough to keep air in, but light-weight enough to hang on extra long tension rod without any issues. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as blackout curtains and they do exactly what they describe!!! We have a huge window that is directly in the sunlight as it rises at 5 am and so it was constantly waking me up; well not anymore! Fantastic product and a must for anyone like me who wanted to block out that annoying early bright sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Noelia G.

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them!. They are better than I expected. I suggest a 3/4" or 1" rod, though. I bought 5/8", and it sags in the center (installing a center support bracket defeats the full slide capability).
customer_reviews.author: Strong!

customer_reviews.title: The colors are not as described
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who designated the color names of these room dividers but the gray is not gray. It is more like a deep taupe. Not a bad color, however, I needed gray. The first room divider I purchased was supposed to be grayish white. But, it was light gray. Not white at all. So, I exchanged it for this dark gray (which is actually taupe) so, it now goes back too.
customer_reviews.author: Hephaistos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect low-cost room divider!
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect as a room divider in my basement (note: I have very low ceilings in my basement). They are well-made and don't really let much light through. Bonus: the grey matches my wall paint much better than I expected! If you have taller ceilings, I would measure to be sure it has the coverage/length that you want.
customer_reviews.author: sillylittleTpot

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great looking curtains for large windows in a casual space. Fabric is very soft and not wrinkle prone. Color (mocha) is very rich looking. No need for attachment hooks, since the curtains slip right over the bar. Very pleased with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: These curtains are not a total blackout but they’re pretty good quality considering the price
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are not a total blackout but they’re pretty good quality considering the price. Same curtains you can find at home depot for like 70-100 bulks, I suggest get this one! I would just say, it doesn’t seem to be true to size? Its like 5-7” shorter than what it supposed to? But still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Was looking for something to separate our bedroom from the bathroom & this was the perfect curtain for that! Definitely worth the money for the quality ! It Came on time and was packaged well, no chemical smell or anything. If you were doubting dont, just buy it !!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget the curtain rod shortens the length
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start off by saying that yes the curtain is indeed the 10 feet length as advertised. However, I did not take into account and it was not listed, that when you put a curtain rod through it; you lose nearly 2 feet so now it doesn't go entirely across my room. Just a cautionary tale when planning what size you may need. Also, maybe I didn't search long enough but I really wish they had more height options such as 6 or 7 feet. This curtain just drags across my hardwood floor getting more dirty than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I will say it is a beautiful product and I like it very much. Really makes my room feel more like an actual room than an open place in a corner. But I do feel like this, as well as all the other similar products of this sort are overpriced. Nonetheless. Great product. Helps me sleep in and blocks all the light from the other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Rukia Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality curtains
customer_reviews.text: Awesome way to save on energy to save on both cooling and heating. Run the curtains between a cold or hot area of the house. You can isolate rooms or space that when isolated can have a 10 to 15 degrees temperature difference. It saves money and makes a room more comfortable. Also works great for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and work well. I used them in my home theater to separate my living room from my kitchen and block out the sun from the windows. I ordered 2 - 10' wide but got 2 15' wide but ended up working better for what I needed :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your purpose and understanding of material will depend on your interpretation of some of the reviews. I used these to make a barrier for a basement apartment rather than permanent walls. I still hear more from the upstairs then I do from the other “rooms” I created with these.
customer_reviews.author: Trial and error

customer_reviews.title: The nice town utter blackout room divider works great on our ...
customer_reviews.text: The nice town utter blackout room divider works great on our sliding door. Living in Arizona we get lots of sunlight shining in that sliding door, but no more. Once we close the curtain we have no more issues of sunlight. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Van Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Blackout curtain
customer_reviews.text: This curtain is great value for money and it does a great job of blocking sunlight. I used it to block sunlight to watch movies on my projection screen during daytime and it works amazingly well! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Creative King!!

customer_reviews.title: Great room divider
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hang on a ceiling track I installed to separate my room and virtual office space. They work beautifully!! Wrinkles from folding came out in the dryer and now I have a beautiful backdrop for meetings ad classes that easily pushes against the wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and look!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what to expect so I took a chance. So glad I did!! It’s A nice thick fabric that completely blocks out light! It’s a bit stretchy so there’s no wrinkles. Great product for dividing up the room in our den.
customer_reviews.author: Presidio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 8'Tall X 10' Wide Cappuccino colored room divider for our cabin bunk room to create an extra bedroom and privacy. It is PERFECT! I love the soft and heavy duty fabric. We simply hung a metal rod across the room and it slides great, then folds up nicely against the wall so it is out of the way when you want it open to add more common space. We couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: libersue

customer_reviews.title: Nice curtains
customer_reviews.text: The dark espresso was a bit off and was expecting something different. Really nice curtains though. Seemed to be made of a good quality Not noise cancelling at all, not that I expected them to be but it came up in the review.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Torres

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these 1,000 times over again
customer_reviews.text: I work graveyard and having a master bedroom with sliding door doesn't make it the easiest finding blackout curtains at my local stores. Prior to getting this curtain I had the typical vertical blinds and my sleeping suffered because of it. The first day I slept with this curtain made such a big difference with my sleep. I actually got into a deep sleep and felt rested. The only light it really lets in is through the rings that your curtain rod goes through, which is a complete ticky-tak thing to worry about. I would absolutely recommend these curtains and I would by them 1,000 time over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer76

customer_reviews.title: Great to block light.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I have a window that runs across my entire bedroom with multiple street lights just outside. This blocks out all the light. I slept so well! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product will be used in a studio for privacy as a room divider. The quality is excellent for a great price. Only time will tell for durability but because of the quality I gave it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: the curtains are actually soft and almost feels like satin however I was disappointed in the fact that they look soft grey on one side and white on the other. was looking for something that was the same on both. size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sid maclean

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of the same color and size in the same order, they came as two different shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for a room divider
customer_reviews.text: Bought in order to make a living room into a separate room. The fabric is not see through and the grommets at the top are very well secured to the fabric. I should have accounted for my curtain rod to not reach the ceiling so I bought one that was too tall and the curtain itself drags on the carpet. Any dirt on it wipes off very easily. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline ES

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and the rings are toothy and catch on my curtain rod
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be durable and made from solid materials but I find it is hard to slide back and forth along my curtain rod without getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: CB Adams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curtains
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very nice quality. Look expensive! Bought 10*8 and fit the patio door very nicely. I wish I bought the 12*8 to give a lot more creases to it. I recommend and would buy again. PS, the fabric is not light airy. It’s thick and heavy but it’s perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MPuttong

customer_reviews.title: Blocks light great. Doesn’t block sound though.
customer_reviews.text: Curtains are a lot lighter in weight than I expected. They block out light very well and allow for privacy in the house. Over all function well as described. However, they are NOT sound-proof or anything even close to that. I was hoping they would block a little sound but they don’t do that at all. I don’t think they advertise for that quality but just know that before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. If you added option to customize the length I would like that. Having them shortened at a cleaners might cost as much as the new blinds cost.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the perfect product
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are perfect. The totally blackout light. They are soft and lovely. The grommet top provides easy opening into a much more compact space than with traditional top curtains. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get privacy.
customer_reviews.text: Great privacy curtain for a deployment, when your roommate wants to play with his plums, and likes to make eye contact. Now I don’t have see any of that, all I need is my headphones to block out the whacking.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great material.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and very thick. They’re great quality and honestly worth the money. I love them. Plus, the gray color is a really beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arizona where the sun is hot and relentless. These curtains do not allow one speck of light through...total blackout! I paid twice as much for curtains that are not half as good as these. Definitely exceeded my expectations! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: mcwillyburn

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product - fast delivery - with it did not wrinkle too much - has to remove wrinkles without a big steamer. Great product tho.
customer_reviews.author: MAXR

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I used this curtain partition to replace an older accordion door partisan. I am very pleased with the product. I used it with a compression curtain rod in the space and it works perfectly! The color as advertised is spot on, the material quality is great and overall look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: BigBroZ

customer_reviews.title: Look like expensive curtains, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice craftsmenship. Look like more expensive curtains. Heavy material, perfect black out and keeps out drafts.
customer_reviews.author: Jami R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fabric!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Not only did the curtains arrive in a timely manner, but the quality of he curtains are top notch for me. These curtains do not come with a pole, so order a pole along with them. I will also mention that the curtains do a good job of trapping heat if you have sectioned off a room using these curtains. I’m very happy and satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Johns

customer_reviews.title: Very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: There's a very heavy spring inside of the post, that can clamp down to your walls. It will never move if you've clamped it down correctly. Also a warning if put against painted walls may cause paint to fall off if removed. Its very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for. Couldn't beat the price. Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love these curtains!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these curtains! Hang beautifully and keeps out light. I ended up buying another pair for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: C Hall

customer_reviews.title: Curtains are Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for a room divider by my front door so it separates the living room & front door. This product is worth the price & love the material very well made very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY S.

customer_reviews.title: Good curtain
customer_reviews.text: Good Curtain. Thick material that completely blacks out light and color is as shown in the pictures. I hang it on a tension rod, and it is not heavy to take the rod down. Had it for a week
customer_reviews.author: Ramez Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: great quality and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks grat but darker colors need a white liner to reflect sun and not absorb heat.
customer_reviews.author: James S. C.

customer_reviews.title: It is as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and is as described by the seller. Works as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Snow

customer_reviews.title: Divide a Room
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is great. Does exactly what I planed with tension rod. !0 room (patio room) divider for guess etc. No sag in tension rod what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Best price and was surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a room divider curtain at home depot but they had nothing close to the size I needed, went to Walmart and target had and they had less, online I found some but were double the price, this curtain fit perfect, was inexpensive and is thick so you can't see through it
customer_reviews.author: Don Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice thick curtains! Thermal but no white backing! Nice! Plus they do block the heat from one area to another. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: snowdogozzie

customer_reviews.title: excellent curtains
customer_reviews.text: great curtains. washed and dried them to remove the fold wrinkles and they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser22

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains! Soft and sunblocking!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curtain!! It's soft and is sun-blocking too! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: T.S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Used for Basement Office
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality curtain and it works great! I have a make-shift home office in my unfinished basement and I used this to carve out the space. It is a heavy material so I feel like it also helps with sound, but I don’t think that is advertised. All in all, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric, and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great value for price. I needed to shorten for RV, fabric is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The best curtains I have ever bought. I have big windows that let in a tremendous amount of light. This blacks it out so well, it does let in a little around the edges but overall still really dark! I bought a couple of these room dividers for my windows and it was cheaper than buying window panels. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Pretty thick, no light comes through, I’d say 99-99.9% light blocked, color and size just as advertised . Perfect for my need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Platinum Member

customer_reviews.title: great room divider solution
customer_reviews.text: These were as advertised. Perfect to separate a small NYC loft. we are vary happy with the purchase. Very dense fabric that blocks light well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great curtain
customer_reviews.text: Used it t as a privacy curtain and I love. Fabric feels sturdy and we'll made
customer_reviews.author: J. Vilain

customer_reviews.title: Room divider
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeps all light out doesnt work for sound
customer_reviews.author: Miiighty review

customer_reviews.title: does not block out noise
customer_reviews.text: very very thin material i put up in my studio apartment and it blocks out 0 noise
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Useful as a Video Screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a room divider and found the quality so good we use it as a projector screen for the playroom.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Space
customer_reviews.text: Used the curtains as a space divider. love the weight and quality. cancels light
customer_reviews.author: PLove3

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! These were actually way heavier and denser than anticipated. The delivery was super fast and installation was a breeze!! Two thumbs up, well actually 4 thumbs up because my wife is thrilled also. ;-)!!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Ketterman

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a room divider
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a room divider. Material is smooth and with no noticeable fabric smells. Purchased metal closet rods and supports from HD for less that $20.
customer_reviews.author: HD Futch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect room divider curtains and definitely met our needs. I’ll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Demeatry Palmer

customer_reviews.title: turn my studio into a 1 bedroom apartment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Its thick, sturdy and blocks out the sun from my kitchen section of my studio apt.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to turn an opened wall room into a bedroom bought two of these work great.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used it to create a bedroom for my daughter in our one bed apartment it’s prefect and keeps the light out of her room to give her privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Decent. Its hangs a bit long from ceiling...its not suoer-th8ck but 9kay. Really like the color.
customer_reviews.author: McAlldp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It was much thinner than expected. He color was exact. It's very long, so it's good for high ceilings. It was kind of expensive tho
customer_reviews.author: Ann Weindel

customer_reviews.title: Great Room divider curtain
customer_reviews.text: Works great and divides the room well that I needed. Nice looking and muffles the sound well. Went back and bought a second one. Also deflects heat.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: COLOR WAS PERFECT , THICK , BLOCK OUT HEAT AND LIGHT , SIZE IS PERFECT .... I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.author: derek black

customer_reviews.title: nothing blocks light 109% unless you want to spend $800 plus product looks good
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, nothing blocks light 109% unless you want to spend $800 plus product looks good
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Jessee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Thick, not see through. Heavy fabric hangs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: J.Bierer

customer_reviews.title: Good in general
customer_reviews.text: Generally good. Quality of the fabric is good and sturdy, no weird smell. I just didn't find it can reduce the noise, but I'm satisfied wjth it's other features
customer_reviews.author: Viola.S

customer_reviews.title: Room add on
customer_reviews.text: I'm Glad I purchased this Product it is very Durable and does Block out the Daylight. I'm using it in my basement to separate rooms for a bedroom, so I didn't have to spend alot of money just to add a new Room. It's a Perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Miller

customer_reviews.title: Heavy blackout curtain
customer_reviews.text: Perfect room divider. We're using in the winter to cover a large screen door that we can't get rid of the draft from. Brilliant quality for low price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: ... don't allow anyone to see through them and are pretty easy to out up
customer_reviews.text: They don't allow anyone to see through them and are pretty easy to out up. I used emt as I needed to go about 15.5 feet.
customer_reviews.author: JTAz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, Durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the product has some weight to it and not light and flimsy. I used it on my Deck for Privicy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty heavy so make sure your curtain rod is strong enough. It's great at blocking out light, pretty good at blocking sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains, but colors did not match.
customer_reviews.text: Love the curtains, keeps the sun out perfectly, the only issue I have is that I ordered two for each side and they seem to be different color greys, one is a little lighter than the other. I will buy another and see if it matches better and then return the other, hopefully that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice curtain, blocks out sunlight, and material has a soft look. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ldeb

customer_reviews.title: Came quick
customer_reviews.text: We haven't hung it yet but I thought room dividers look the same on both sides. This one does not but hopefully it will look ok once we get it up!
customer_reviews.author: S. Machado

customer_reviews.title: These went up very easy, very heavy duty and a great room divider.
customer_reviews.text: These went up very easy, very heavy duty and a great room divider.
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful room divider curtains. The quality of the material is great.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for what I needed! We downgrades and our living room was split into a room/living room. And this is perfect, exactly what I was looking for. Very heavy duty and I love that it is reversible so to say. Meaning it’s the same color and fabric on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Suyapa Hernandez

product_meta.title: NICETOWN Room Dividers Curtains Screens Partitions, Room Darkening Grommet Curtains Room Divider for Bookcase, Heavy - Duty Blackout Privacy Curtains (1 Piece, 10ft Width x 8ft Length, Greyish White)
feature_bullets: CURTAIN DETAILS: The room divider curtain's fabric is super soft, thickness and heavy innovative triple-weave polyester fabric. The 12 sliver grommets top (inner diameter is 1.6-inch) adds a modern touch and easy hanging. ONLY CURTAIN INCLUDE.

SPACE SOLUTION: Curtains can be a clever and temporary solution for creating new spaces without building walls. You can still let in light if and when you choose, making them a perfect choice to allow flexibility in a small space.

MULTIPLE FUNCTION: Just draw ROOM DIVIDER CURTAINS shut when either side needs privacy, body shape hidden behind them. Besides, heavy curtains can be more effective than doors for soundproof, as the material absorbs rather than bounces the sound.

PORTABLE & SUITABLE: Room divider curtains are easily installed and easily packed up, moved, and reused! Perfect for City Loft, Office Space, Shared Bedroom, High Ceilings, Factories, Hospitals, Studio, Dorm, Storage Space, Cafes, hotels, etc.
CARE INSTRUCTION: Good quality finishing will withstand years of use. Wash the water temperature below 86F. Mild detergent no bleaching. Low-temperature ironing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,259 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Machine Washable, Hand Washable, Do not Bleach
